name: New Mountain Capital
overview: New Mountain Capital, together with its affiliates (“New Mountain”), manages private equity and public equity capital with aggregate assets under management totaling more than $8.5 billion [1]. New Mountain’s first private equity fund, the $770 million New Mountain Partners, L.P., began its investment period in January 2000. New Mountain’s second private equity fund, the $1.55 billion New Mountain Partners II, L.P., began its investment period in January 2005. New Mountain’s third private equity fund, New Mountain Partners III, L.P., with over $5.1 billion of aggregate commitments, began its investment period in August 2007. New Mountain manages public equity portfolios through New Mountain Vantage Advisers, L.L.C. (“Vantage”). Vantage is designed to apply New Mountain’s established strengths as an acquirer and builder of businesses toward non-control positions in the U.S. public equity markets generally.
